summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Lock-in Locks Goal Setup Screen. All core functionality working correctly including form validation, localStorage persistence, confirmation overlay, auto-routing to dashboard, and persistent data handling after page reload.

ui_bugs.issue: HTML5 datetime-local input accepts past dates despite min attribute
ui_bugs.impact: Users can set past deadlines which may cause logical issues
ui_bugs.note: Browser-specific behavior - some browsers may enforce min attribute differently

integration_issues.issue: Dropdown options require JavaScript interaction due to HTML structure with nested spans
integration_issues.impact: Slight accessibility concern but functionality works
integration_issues.note: Console shows hydration warnings but doesn't break functionality

passed_tests: Initial load: Goal setup screen displays correctly when no localStorage data exists
Form fields: All three required fields (distraction, goal, deadline) present and empty initially
Submit button state: Disabled (grey) when fields empty, active (green) when all filled
Distraction field: Text input accepts user input correctly
Category dropdown: All 6 categories (üì± Phone, üéÆ Gaming, üì∫ TV, üçï Snacks, üéµ Music, üîí Other) display and selectable
Goal field: Textarea accepts multi-line input correctly
Deadline field: Date/time picker accepts future dates and displays correctly
Human-readable deadline: Formatted deadline displays below picker (e.g., 'Locked until Saturday, December 20, 2025 at 5:30 PM')
Form validation: Button transitions from disabled to active when all fields filled
Whitespace validation: Empty fields with only whitespace properly rejected
Submit functionality: Clicking active button triggers submission successfully
localStorage persistence: All 4 values saved correctly (distraction_name, distraction_category, goal_description, goal_deadline)
Confirmation overlay: Appears immediately after submit with correct data display
Confirmation content: Category emoji, distraction name, goal description, and formatted deadline display correctly
Confirmation message: 'Your lock is now active.' displays in green as expected
Auto-routing: Confirmation shows for 2 seconds then routes to dashboard automatically
Dashboard integration: Successfully navigates to existing dashboard component
Persistent data flow: After reload with localStorage data, skips goal setup and goes directly to dashboard
All categories functional: Phone, Gaming, TV, Snacks, Music, and Other categories all work correctly
localStorage cleanup: Clearing localStorage returns user to goal setup screen
Mobile responsive: 390px mobile viewport renders and functions perfectly
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding client-side validation for past dates in DeadlineField component to prevent users from setting invalid deadlines, though current implementation works correctly for valid use cases.
